main.name: Miryam Bathilde
main.description: Passionate about technology and programming, I have been training and developing projects to develop and improve my skills as a web developer for more than a year.
main.bio: Hi, I'm Miryam, I'm finishing my FullStack Developer studies. I love to develop fully functional web projects with the latest and most current technologies. Although I have not yet had the opportunity to work in a company, I have been putting into practice all the knowledge I'm acquiring, developing projects to improve my skills.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch for further details.
